languages.text: "Ты поверил в ложь ереси. Продал душу Архиврагу. Но если ты отринешь этот путь, у тебя еще есть шанс на настоящее спасение".

traits.locale_text: "Ты поверил в ложь ереси. Продал душу Архиврагу. Но если ты отринешь этот путь, у тебя еще есть шанс на настоящее спасение".

languages.text: "You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."
languages.original_text: "Ты поверил в ложь ереси. Продал душу Архиврагу. Но если ты отринешь этот путь, у тебя еще есть шанс на настоящее спасение".

traits.locale_text: "You believed the lies of heresy. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you shun this path, you will yet have a chance to be genuinely saved."
"You believed the lies of heresy. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you shun this path, you will yet have a chance to be genuinely saved."
"You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will yet have a chance to be truly saved."
"You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will yet have a chance to be truly saved."
"You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."
"You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."

languages.text: "Ihr habt die ketzerischen Lügen geglaubt. Ihr habt Eure Seele an den Erzfeind verkauft. Doch wenn Ihr diesem Pfad widersagt, besteht für Euch noch Hoffnung auf Rettung."
languages.original_text: "You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die ketzerischen Lügen geglaubt. Ihr habt Eure Seele an den Erzfeind verkauft. Doch wenn Ihr diesem Pfad widersagt, besteht für Euch noch Hoffnung auf Rettung."

languages.text: « Vous avez cru aux mensonges de l'hérétique. Vous avez vendu votre âme au Grand Ennemi. Mais si vous renoncez à suivre cette voie, il vous reste une chance d'être véritablement sauvé. »
languages.original_text: "You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez cru aux mensonges de l'hérétique. Vous avez vendu votre âme au Grand Ennemi. Mais si vous renoncez à suivre cette voie, il vous reste une chance d'être véritablement sauvé. »

languages.text: “你相信了异端的谎言，把灵魂出卖给了混沌大敌。可你如果及时放弃的话，还有机会获得救赎。”
languages.original_text: "You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."

traits.locale_text: “你相信了异端的谎言，把灵魂出卖给了混沌大敌。可你如果及时放弃的话，还有机会获得救赎。”

languages.text: 「お前は異端者が嘘をつくと信じていた。お前は渾沌の勢力に魂を売った。しかし、その道を捨てれば、真に救われる機会がまだある」
languages.original_text: "You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は異端者が嘘をつくと信じていた。あなたは渾沌の勢力に魂を売った。しかし、その道を捨てれば、真に救われる機会がまだある」

languages.text: «Creyó las mentiras del hereje. Vendió su alma al Archienemigo. Pero si renuncia a este camino, aún tendrá la oportunidad de salvarse de verdad».
languages.original_text: "You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."

traits.locale_text: «Creyó las mentiras del hereje. Vendió su alma al Archienemigo. Pero si renuncia a este camino, aún tendrá la oportunidad de salvarse de verdad».

languages.text: "Kâfirlerin yalanlarına inandın. Ruhunu Şerbaşı'na sattın lakin bu yoldan dönersen gerçek manada kurtulma şansın hâlâ var."
languages.original_text: "You believed the heretic lies. You sold your soul to the Archenemy. But if you renounce this path, you will still have a chance to be truly saved."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlerin yalanlarına inandın. Ruhunu Şerbaşı'na sattın lakin bu yoldan dönersen gerçek manada kurtulma şansın hâlâ var."
